title: Soukhya Homes
content: Luxury Community Living for Senior Citizens. We take pride in taking care of people. Community living for senior citizens with all luxury and safety measures. Retire with a peaceful and serene atmosphere. Doctor & clinic, ayurveda wellness, and 24/7 security. Enquire Now and Download Brochure available on the site.

title: Contact Us
content: Contact us today to schedule a visit or learn more about our vibrant community. Location: Kottappady, Kothamangalam, Ernakulam-686692. Emails: soukhyahomes@gmail.com, soukhyahomesserviceteam@gmail.com. Phones: +91 9447218356, +91 9446843367, +91 9677227627, +91 8281917428. WhatsApp: +91 9677227627. Enquire and Brochure links available.

title: About Soukhya Homes
content: Soukhya Retirement Living: A comfortable community lifestyle for seniors, surrounded by nature. Located near Kothamangalam, Ernakulam. Vision: serene, calm environment with companionship, resort-style living, yoga, library, fitness centre, and assisted living support.
